data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Amasya, Turkey.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amasya, Turkey
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 121 believers in Amasya.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Amasya with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 121 believers find a person of peace today among the 321,880 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Bosniak people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Amasya, Turkey to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Amasya, Turkey to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Amasya, Turkey. Please, stir the 121 believers here to pray for awakening.

location.name: Amasya
